name: yolo-project-plugins
description: YOLO Object Detection Project Plugin Bundle - Tools for training, deployment, and optimization

plugins.name: yolo-training-advisor
plugins.description: Training workflow advisor that helps optimize hyperparameters, detect overfitting, and improve model performance
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: dataset-quality-guard
plugins.description: Dataset quality validator that checks annotations, detects class imbalance, and ensures YOLO format compliance
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: api-performance-optimizer
plugins.description: FastAPI performance analyzer and optimizer for YOLO inference endpoints
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: model-deployment-assistant
plugins.description: Deployment guide for exporting and optimizing YOLO models (ONNX, TensorRT, CoreML)
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: training-monitor
plugins.description: Real-time training monitor that tracks metrics, detects anomalies, and provides recommendations
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: yolo-security-advisor
plugins.description: Security best practices for YOLO API endpoints, preventing common vulnerabilities
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: data-augmentation-tuner
plugins.description: Data augmentation strategy optimizer for improving model generalization
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: inference-optimizer
plugins.description: Inference speed and accuracy optimizer with batch processing recommendations
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: yolo-learning-assistant
plugins.description: Interactive learning guide explaining YOLO concepts, architecture, and best practices
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team

plugins.name: model-comparison-tool
plugins.description: Compare different YOLO model variants (n/s/m/l/x) and recommend the best for your use case
plugins.author: YOLO Project Team
